comment: Professor Sisler was a very sweet lady! You have to attend the majority of classes and turn in everything on time. Late work affects your grade heavily.
I took this class last semester in 2021. Great professor. The class wasn't too hard but was challenging at times. She is really sweet though but can be a little touch at times.

Sisler was a great professor. Attendance was mandatory, and she could be a fairly harsh grader. While she was a harsh grader, she made the class really enjoyable with her personality, and she cares a lot about her students.
